title: Telstra jobs bloodbath as hundreds face the axe while work is shipped to India and AI takes over
description: Telstra is preparing to cut hundreds of jobs as it shifts more work to artificial intelligence systems and offshore contractors in India.
content:
Telstra is preparing to cut hundreds of jobs as it shifts more work to artificial intelligence systems and offshore contractors in India.
Internal emails show up to 650 roles could be axed, with some roles set to be outsourced to a technology partner... [1508 chars]

title: Top Putin aide to lead Russian delegation for AI Impact Summit in New Delhi
description: MOSCOW, Feb 15 : Russian President Vladimir Putin’s senior aide Maxim Oreshkin will lead a large delegation for the AI Impact Summit being held in New Delhi from Monday. India is set to host the AI Impact Summit 2026, a high-profile gathering of global leaders and industry heavyweights in Artificial Intelligence from February 16-20 at New Delhi’s ‘Bharat Mandapam,’ bringing together policymakers, industry leaders and technology innovators. Oreshkin, who is deputy chief of the Kremlin staff and economic aide to […]
content:
MOSCOW, Feb 15 : Russian President Vladimir Putin’s senior aide Maxim Oreshkin will lead a large delegation for the AI Impact Summit being held in New Delhi from Monday.

title: PM Modi invites world to host data in India
description: NEW DELHI, Feb 15: With the Budget providing incentives to turbocharge investments in data centres, Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday pitched India as a global hub for digital infrastructure and artificial intelligence, saying the country is ready to host the world’s data and lead the next wave of the technology revolution. “The tax incentives announced in the Budget are designed to accelerate investment in this space, lower the cost of building advanced facilities and position India as a globally-competitive […]

title: Bill Gates to visit Andhra on Monday, hold talks with CM Naidu: Min Narayana
description: AMRAVATI, Feb 15: Microsoft founder Bill Gates will visit Amaravati on February 16 and hold discussions with Chief Minister N Chandrababu Naidu on expanding cooperation in health and artificial intelligence initiatives, Andhra Pradesh minister P Narayana on Sunday. Gates is expected to arrive at the state secretariat here around 10 am on Monday and meet with Naidu, IT Minister Nara Lokesh and Deputy Chief Minister Pawan Kalyan briefly. “Gates will visit Amaravati on Monday and hold discussions with Naidu on […]

title: AI Centre of Excellence soon to curb graft in water supply
description: Jaipur: The Rajasthan govt will soon deploy artificial intelligence (AI) to curb corruption in water supply and related projects across the state.Offi.
content: Jaipur: The Rajasthan govt will soon deploy artificial intelligence (AI) to curb corruption in water supply and related projects across the state. Officials said the Public Health Engineering Department (PHED) will set up a Centre of Excellence at th... [1648 chars]

title: Bill Gates to visit Andhra today, hold talks with Chandrababu Naidu on health, AI
description: Bill Gates, founder-chairman of the Gates Foundation, will visit Andhra Pradesh on Monday to discuss expanding collaboration with the state government in health, education, agriculture and artificial intelligence.
content:
Bill Gates, founder-chairman of the Gates Foundation, will visit Andhra Pradesh on Monday to explore deeper collaboration with the state government across health, education, agriculture and artificial intelligence.

title: AI Impact Summit & Indian
description: At this week's New Delhi summit, India will push for expanding the Global Partnership on Artificial Intelligence (GPAI) and attempt to make it India's AI lobby.

title: He spent decades perfecting his voice, but now he says Google stole it
description: David Greene had never heard of NotebookLM, Google’s buzzy artificial intelligence tool, until a former colleague emailed him to ask if he’d lent it his voice.
content:
David Greene had never heard of NotebookLM, Google’s buzzy artificial intelligence tool that spins up podcasts on demand, until a former colleague emailed him to ask if he’d lent it his voice.
“So … I’m probably the 148th person to ask this, but did ... [9942 chars]

title: Hollywood groups slams ByteDance's AI video generator
description: A new artificial intelligence video generator from Beijing-based ByteDance, the creator of TikTok, is drawing the ire of Hollywood organizations that say Seedance 2.0 “blatantly” violates copyright and uses the likeness of actors and others without permission.
